name: Scitk
tagline: Java GUI toolkit for analytic applications
body:
### Welcome to the SciTK website

This goal of this library is to greatly simplify writing basic scientific-type applications. The toolkit provides functionality for most of the user interface, allowing you to write an application that focuses on the analysis and offload GUI work to SciTK.

Plots are created using the [JFreeChart](http://www.jfree.org/jfreechart/) library, and are wrapped into windows with functionality for editing or saving the plot. A few varieties of dialog are available for getting input from the user. Some GUI elements are implemented into a template main window which can be extended for simple applications.

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

If you're using the GitHub for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.

### Using the code
There is a simple example program included with the source. Look under the _example_ directory for a program which adds several buttons to the SciTK application window. These buttons then generate some plots. More info here in the future!

### Documentation
asdf

### Authors and Contributors
Created and maintained by @azylstra

### Support or Contact
For support, please create an issue on GitHub and assign it to @azylstra
